mapper.sql: id, attach_path, oss_url, cdn_url, mime_type, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, version, is_deleted
mapper.insert:
insert into bbs_attach (id, attach_path, oss_url, cdn_url, mime_type, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, version, is_deleted) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.attachPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ossUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cdnUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mimeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isDeleted,jdbcType=BOOLEAN})
